creator: rcook@dynaxys.com
text:
Many new applications require PDF documents with fillable form fields, to allow the user to fill in the form with the computer and upload it to a server, rather than filling the form in by hand and mailing it in.
Add ability in FOP to generate pdf documents containing "fillable form fields".
resetting P2 open bugs to P3 pending further review
creator: gadams@apache.org
